dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Moeller, Kari [mailto:Kari.Moeller@turner.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 21, 2005 12:12 PM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement



This is to notify you that the web page at  <http://67.18.222.146/cnn.html>
http://67.18.222.146/cnn.htm and hosted by The Planet Internet Services,
Inc. ("the Unauthorized Page") infringes upon the intellectual property
rights of CNN.  The Unauthorized Page, which is a fake CNN.com story,
infringes copyrights and trademark rights held by CNN in its site located at
CNN.com.  The Unauthorized Page is not authorized by CNN, its agents, or the
law.   We request that the Unauthorized Page be immediately disabled.

Under penalty of perjury, I hereby declare that this Notice is accurate and
that I am authorized to act on behalf of CNN. 

Thank you, 

Kari L. Moeller 
Counsel 
Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. 
One CNN Center, 13 North 
Atlanta, Georgia 30303 
T/ 404.827.2211 
F/ 404.827.1994
kari.moeller@turner.com
